column5: Great day, I actully pressed the snooze button 4 times befor waking up. Simply wasting my fishing time, what was I thinking. Not counting the little ones, landed 4 fish, and a BIG fish got away! It just kept on going down stream, eventually it hooked me up good on a log.  Before I sleep, pictures!  Start slow   Few hrs later   I'll try to improve the fish handle, so no mud next time.   Its like glowing out of my hands   Crazy fish!   Going to bed now. If I wake up on Sunday, I'll go again. This opener day fishing is really tiring, can't even tie a Parlamor knot right now, my vision has becoming blurry, and I can't even feed the line through the hook eye!
Awesome report and thank you for sharing!....Mmmmmm trout on the BBQ!!!  G
good report and congrats on the fish
Great report Young_One nice pictures keep up the good work  Rob
Great stuff young one!  Congrats on a great day out there.  Hope you are well rested now....LOL.
Very nice!  The water looks pretty clear compared to last week eh? Looks like you had a great day. Thanks for sharing
